{/* DESCRIPTION */}

Project Description

This restaurant project is a full-stack web application designed to digitally manage and display a restaurantâ€™s menu in a clean, user-friendly way.

The backend is built using Django and Django REST Framework, providing structured APIs for categories, subcategories, and menu items.

The frontend is developed with React, focusing on dynamic rendering, filters (veg/non-veg), and expandable subcategories.

Overall, it helps restaurants present their offerings clearly while making menu updates easy and scalable.
